welcome_message_body: Welcome to Soka, Japan! This charming city is known for its traditional festivals, beautiful parks, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Soka has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal dedicated to international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
